title: Ghostbusters - Original Soundtrack Album (2006) (FLAC)
description:
Remastered edition of the 1984 soundtrack to GHOSTBUSTERS, now including two bonus tracks.

Ripped with Exact Audio Copy V0.99 prebeta 4 in secure mode. Losslessly compressed with FLAC 1.2.1.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ghostbusters" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ghostbusters</a>

Released: 2006
Genre:    Stage & Screen, Electronic, Rock
Style:    Soundtrack, Modern Classical, Pop Rock, Synth-pop

Tracklisting:

 2. The Bus Boys: "Cleanin' Up the Town" (2:58)

 4. The Thompson Twins: "In the Name of Love" (3:19)

 6. Laura Branigan: "Hot Night" (3:21)
 7. Mick Smiley: "Magic" (4:20)
 8. Elmer Bernstein: "Main Title Theme (Ghostbusters)" (3:00)
 9. Elmer Bernstein: "Dana's Theme" (3:32)
10. Ray Parker Jr.: "Ghostbusters (Instrumental Version)" (4:48)
11. The Trammps: "Disco Inferno" (10:57)
